name: SoCalGas
0:
”Alexa, open socal gas”
”What's my balance?”
”How do I transfer service?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: socal gas
des:
This is the official skill of SoCalGas® (Southern California Gas Company) in California for Amazon Alexa. In this skill, you can get your balance and due date, and learn about popular topics such as your account information, natural gas services, billing and payment, safety, and clean energy.

Here are several things Amazon Alexa can help you do today:

Current balance and due date
How to schedule services, including start, transfer, and stop service
My Account profile login and password help
How to pay your bill
SoCalGas sustainability initiatives
Safety tips
Savings tips
Information on customer assistance programs
Rebate programs

Stay tuned for more exciting new features that will be coming soon!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
